competition_summary.context: COMPETITION The market for entertainment video is intensely competitive and subject to rapid change.  We compete with a broad set of activities for consumers’ leisure time, including other entertainment video providers, such as linear TV, streaming entertainment providers (including those that provide pirated content), video gaming providers and more broadly against other sources of entertainment, like social media, that our members could choose in their moments of free time.
